name: tease out the delta of the data
description:
Across Successes: What changed? These are transitions (and loose requirements)
Between Success/Failure: What's the same across successes, of those, what's different in the failures. Those are requirements.
Use this to create a new plan that replaces the old one. (don't discard it yet, just don't use it)

test the new plan against the experience - this shouldn't be needed immediately; it should just work on all of them, but its a good proof of concept. If it's really a waste of time, just comment it out and save the result as 100%
